typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		JourneyState as string,
		OrganizationId as string,
		JourneyRef as (ObjectRef as string, OperatingDayDate as string),
		TimeStamps as (TimeStamp as string, Name as string)[],
		partitionKey as string,
		LastModifiedDateTime as string,
		ttl as string,
		id as string,
		Type as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string,
		EventType as string,
		BlockAssignment as (BlockRef as (ObjectRef as string, OperatingDayDate as string), BlockNumber as string),
		TransportMode as string,
		ReportedByOrganizationId as string,
		VehicleRef as string,
		VehicleNumber as string,
		ValidFromDateTime as string,
		Calls as (SequenceNumber as string, ArrivalState as string, DepartureState as string, ArrivalForecastDateTime as string, ArrivalObservedDateTime as string, DepartureForecastDateTime as string, DepartureObservedDateTime as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourceJson
sourceJson sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		JourneyState,
		OrganizationId,
		TimeStamps,
		partitionKey,
		LastModifiedDateTime,
		ttl,
		id,
		Type,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts},
		EventType,
		BlockAssignment,
		TransportMode,
		ReportedByOrganizationId,
		VehicleRef,
		VehicleNumber,
		ValidFromDateTime,
		Calls,
		ObjectRef = JourneyRef.ObjectRef,
		OperatingDayDate = JourneyRef.OperatingDayDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
